overview: "Dechoukaj (uprooting): Haiti's long rebellion" is a short documentary looking at Haiti's long history of resistance to colonial and imperialist domination. The film gives a concise overview of Haiti's history - from its revolution in 1791-1804, through the 1915 US occupation and through countless dictators - to situate the mass resistance today in motion across the nation.
title: Dechoukaj: Haiti's long rebellion
